html.p: Data Collection: WinEventLog:Security events from Splunk Add-on for Windows.

search.query: `cs_wineventlog_security` | head 1 | stats count | eval data=if(count>0, "Data Present", "Data Not Present"), label="`cs_wineventlog_security`" | table label, data

| makeresults | eval host_name = if("***"=="$tkn_host$","","host") | eval append_query=if("***"=="$tkn_host$","","join type=left host user [| search `cs_wineventlog_security` EventCode IN (4624,4648) user!=*$ | eval Workstation_Name=if(EventCode==\"4648\" AND Target_Server==\"localhost\",host,Workstation_Name) | where Workstation_Name!=\"-\" | stats count as no_of_logins by user Workstation_Name | rename Workstation_Name as host ] | fillnull value=0 no_of_logins")

`cs_wineventlog_security` EventCode=4672 host=$tkn_host|s$ user=$tkn_user|s$ user!=*$ | stats values(privilege_id) as privilege_id by $tkn_host_stats$ user | mvexpand privilege_id | lookup windows_privilege_lookup privilege_id OUTPUT privilege as privilege_new | eval Privilege=if(isnotnull(privilege_new),privilege_id." (".privilege_new.")" ,privilege_id) | stats values(Privilege) as Privilege by $tkn_host_stats$ user | eval count=mvcount(Privilege) | sort - count | fields - count | $tkn_host_stats_appedquery$

`cs_wineventlog_security` TERM(EventCode=4673) host IN ($tkn_host$) | stats values(host) as hosts, values(privilege_id) as privileges, values(service) as services, count by user, process, status | eval status=status." (".count.")" | stats values(status) as status, values(hosts) as hosts, values(privileges) as privileges, values(services) as services, sum(count) as count by user, process | sort - count | fields - count | lookup windows_privilege_lookup privilege_id AS privileges OUTPUT privilege as privilege_new | eval privileges=if(isnotnull(privilege_new),privileges." (".privilege_new.")" ,privileges) | fields - privilege_new
